name: Ginger Butter Sauce
keywords: butter, ginger root, shallot, gluten-free, nut-free, vegetarian

recipeInstructions.text: Heat one tablespoon of the butter in a saucepan and add the shallots and ginger. Cook briefly, stirring, and add the vinegar and wine. Cook until reduced to one-third cup. Add the cream, bring to the boil and add remaining butter. Put the sauce through a fine sieve, pressing to extract as much liquid as possible from the solids. Keep warm.
